db:abstract.db:para: [attached-property-reuse] Attached type was initialized multiple times.

db:article.db:para: This warning category is spelled [attached-property-reuse] by qmllint.

db:section.db:title: Using attached type already initialized in a parent scope
What happened?
db:section.db:para: You initialized a propagating attached type multiple times.

db:note.db:para: This mostly happens for attached types that inherit from QQuickAttachedPropertyPropagator.

db:section.db:title: Why is this bad?
db:section.db:para: Propagating attached objects consume memory for each instantiation but only need to be initialized once.
